regular.text: Namaste, veer yodha! Aapke dil mein sapne aur junoon jag rahe hain – iss jadui safar ka pehla padav, anek rahasyon se bhara hai, jahan har kadam mein dil aur himmat ki dhun bajti hai!
Chalo, himmat se aage badho! Jaise har shandar yodha ki kahani ek nayi shuruaat se shuru hoti hai, waise hi aapka safar hai ek damdaar pehel – zindagi ka asli rang dikhane ka waqt aa gaya hai!
Andheron ke maidan mein apni shaan aur jazbe ka pramaan do! Yeh khel hai unhi ke liye jo hausle se ladte hain, kyunki jeet unka intezar karti hai jo apni taqat aur astitva ko samarpit kar dete hain!

vip.text: Swagat hai, izzatdar mehmaan! Aapke liye aasmaani jagat ke sone ke darwaze khulte hain, jaise roshni se bhari subah ka vaada ho!
Dekhiye, pavitra aangan jahan sirf chuninda dil kadam rakhte hain. Sadiyon ke raaz, ab aapki nazron ke saamne ujagar hone ko hain!
Aapki VIP pehchaan kholti hai raaz bhare itihaas ke anokhe saamagriyon ka raasta, aur chamatkari shaktiyan, jo insaan ki soch se pare hain!
